website_summaries.verdict: A set specifically created to design cars and vehicles on working wheels.
pros: Any child who is interested in cars will love creating their own with these Magformers
Triangles, squares, and hexagons to build the vehicles, and wheels to finish them off
The shapes have a unique silver border around them, giving the cars a modern look
cons: These shapes have silver borders, so they look different  but are still compatible with all Magformers shapes

customer_reviews.title: like many reviews of this product have stated
customer_reviews.text: These, like many reviews of this product have stated, appear to be knock-offs. While they do work with the Magformer brand tiles, they are noticeably thinner and the magnets aren't as strong. My son doesn't seem bothered by the difference, but I'm annoyed. Would not purchase this product again. For the price, I want the real deal. Picture shows the original Magformers on the left, the knock-off ones on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanna M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool learning toy
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our 5-year old grandson because he loves creating things. There are just enough pieces for him to build with. His 2 year old sister loves them as well and just likes stacking or making patterns with them The magnets are strong and hold well. And you're teaching shape names as you go. Win-win.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Keiffer

customer_reviews.title: Best toy in years!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth set that I have bought for my great- grand kids and they love them all. They especially wanted this set because they needed the hexagons. The sets are all different, but they all work together. I also bought extra wheels so they could make their projects mobile. Cleanup is easy, but I do have them keep these magnets separate from their other toys. My only disappointment is that magformers doesn't make extra pieces to purchase separately so they don't get so many of the same pieces by adding sets. That way we could buy more pieces and it would be more economical to the parents. See what you can do, Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M.G.N.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed in this set compared to the other Magformers we already own. The quality does not compare. The pieces seem like a lighter weight plastic, and the magnets are definitely not as strong as the other sets we've purchased. My main reason for buying was to get another set of wheels, but there are other sets that include wheels that have sturdier pieces. I would have returned if my kids didn't rip open the packaging, but definitely will be more careful buying future sets.
customer_reviews.author: DEM

customer_reviews.title: Magformers cruise set
customer_reviews.text: I read reviews stating the these magformers were pretty much offbrand and did not work as well. So I was worried getting them and having the boys play with them. First let me just say... These are much higher quality compared to the other sets. From tests, these magnets are much stronger as well. My children (2yrs and 4yrs) sometimes have trouble pulling the magnets apart. Things we build do not come apart easily at all. And of course, the wheels on this set are a huge hit with the kids!!! I’m honestly going to purchase a 2-3 more sets just to get the higher quality/stronger magnets. HUGE HIT IN OUR HOME!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun but no instructions
customer_reviews.text: My four year old got the expanded basic set for his birthday and LOVES them, so we got this set for him for Christmas. He loves them too! My only complaint is that while the basic set came with a really great instruction booklet for building different projects, this one has a book but no instructions, you have to just build the cars by looking at the pictures of them, which is easy for an adult to do but he really liked the step by step instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: SO awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These Magformer sets are so incredible! My son can play for hours. I am truly amazed with what he has built using the pictures provided and then the ones he has been inspired to desgn on his own. They are pricey, but well worth the investment for the happiness they bring and the stimulation to the imagination. Some other boys came over that had never seen them before and they had a blast. Noone wanted to go in the pool, they wanted to play Magformers! I have shopped around and Amazon truly has the BEST prices on these - especially in the Fall in prep for the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: CCA

customer_reviews.title: Great fun activity
customer_reviews.text: These magformers lets your creative senses to come out in full flow as there are so many things that you can build with them. Some reviewers are complaining that this particular set is of inferior quality but what they don't realize is that this is the cruizer set which needs lighter and thinner material so that you can build moving objects out of it. I also have the a Magformers 62 piece designer set and they are more sturdier because they are for a different purpose. Overall a very nice idea and I am sure most kids would love to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Vivek P.

customer_reviews.title: seems like solid quality to me
customer_reviews.text: I see a lot of mixed reviews related to quality. Not sure if there was a manufacturing change, or inconsistent batches, but ours at least is quite solid. We already had some Magformers -- these are ever so slightly thinner than our previous ones, but otherwise feel just as solid, and we've had no problems with them. As far as the set itself goes, the hexagon and wheels are great additions, and really open up a lot of new building options.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Falkner-Horine

customer_reviews.title: Love the XL
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 1 year old and 4 year old for Christmas. I’m not sure why, but this set is different from the basic set we also bought, however, I think these feel a little stronger, and each magnet is longer than the other set (maybe hence the XL?). They both love playing with these
customer_reviews.author: Blake M

customer_reviews.title: We have another set of just squares and triangles and he loves to put them all together and create cool trucks. He also asks me to make the ...
customer_reviews.text: My three year old loves this set. We have another set of just squares and triangles and he loves to put them all together and create cool trucks. He also asks me to make the vehicles in the idea booklet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My Autistic child is so easily frustrated when building toys because of his fine motor delays. We have had many types of magnetic toys but he gets frustrated with them and we move on quickly to another. However, he absolutely LOVES these and they are reasonable strong. He builds all storts of buildings and vehicles with these and has a huge smile on his face the entire time. We keep buying additional sets.
customer_reviews.author: Sunndays in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Good little magnetic building toys, wheels are key!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nice set, though small. It does give you the wheels, which you can use with other kits. I don't think the specific tractor pattern was ever made, but my nephew loves these, he's three. His favorite thing to do is ask others to build something and then smash it down. Magnets hold pretty well. Not sure if this is compatible with other brands. Took one star off as packaging was damaged when received.
customer_reviews.author: Jorder

customer_reviews.title: Magnets are great fun
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my grandson for Christmas. I have 5 grandchildren and everyone of them has enjoyed playing with this set. Magnets always fascinate children and they spend hours moving around the colorful pieces and building different structures. They especially like the fact that wheels are included. What little boy does not enjoy toys on wheels. This is a very good product for learning and stimulates their creativity.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: My son got this for Christmas and has loved it. It was our first magformer set and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas and has loved it. It was our first magformer set and has been well worth it. He has had fun creating the different vehicles. He loves to follow instructions and doesn't step out to create something on his own, there are a lot of plans and hasn't felt bored. He wishes there was one more set of wheels to build more vehicles.We may nee to purchase another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: ChappyBean

customer_reviews.title: Fun Toy for Boys!
customer_reviews.text: We love magformers and added this to our collection. Love the oversized pieces and the big wheels to create unique vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these
customer_reviews.text: I got these while they had a sale other wise these are a bit expensive. This kids love them and make new things all the time. I like the kits with the wheels since it adds another dimension to this.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Pankratz

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful building set for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about magformers! My kids (especially my son) absolutely love these! Have been using them since they were 3, at almost 5 these magnetic blocks still provide a great amount of quiet time. Adding the wheels to this set made it even more fun for my son, not only does he get to build amazing towers, but now he creates all sorts of interesting vehicles. These also make awesome gifts! Since the blocks are magnetic, clean up and storage is very easy...we don't end up with a thousand pieces all over the house.
customer_reviews.author: sonia

customer_reviews.title: A "can't go wrong" gift idea
customer_reviews.text: This is the 4th Magformers set I have given my grandson. He loves them all but is currently enamored with making various cars and crashing them through the magnetic fences I build. These are very durable pieces! This set would be even better if an extra set of wheels had been included so he could make two cars to race at the same time. I do like that the shapes from each Magformers set can be used with all the other sets.
customer_reviews.author: MN mom

customer_reviews.title: For the price and all the great reviews, I was expecting more
customer_reviews.text: With all the great reviews on these, I was expecting a win. The magnets are not as strong as I thought they would be. My son is almost 4 and he has a hard time with these, as the magnets loose connectivity and the truck or car he built will fall apart... then he trows a fit. He loves engineering type toys (plays with his Tinker Toys every day). They are very pricey too. I've decided to put them up for now and try again in another 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Stand the test of time! A great toy!
customer_reviews.text: It has been a couple of years since we bought these. The kids have gone through phases of not caring about them and then times when they can't get enough of them. Our oldest likes to build little bombs and thrown them around to 'explode'. They've held up really well and are still a staple toy in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Brian H

customer_reviews.title: Hoolked on Magformers
customer_reviews.text: So I baby sat 3 kids who pulled these out to play with and I was instantly hooked! I came right home and got on Amazon and ordered a set for my "Gramma's Toy Box". I ended up odering another set 2 weeks later! I confess that I even play with them when the grandkids aren't around. However, it is the 1st thing my grandkids go to when they get to our house. The patterns are easy to assemble and then there are countless other things you can make with a little imagination. They are kind of theraputic after a busy day.
customer_reviews.author: dmlopez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 and 7 year old boys LOVE this set. We have other Magformers, and we love those, too, but this set it super fun! They don’t follow the book much, but can create their own vehicles in no time. A big hit here at our house!
customer_reviews.author: StephyL

customer_reviews.title: Magformers review
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friend of my family. They loved playing with the toy but found it a little difficult to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa and Gary

customer_reviews.title: You will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are one of the best gifts I have ever bought my grandchildren. Their ages range from 10-3 and they all love them. Unlike many "toys" children play with, with magformers they play for hours using their imagination. I have purchased many different sets with many different shapes. My grandchildren love this set because they can build vehicles that really roll around. I've highly recommended magformers to many of my friends and have in return received nothing but praise.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Magformers are so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and gives a child entertainment for hours at a time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hypnotizes babies...
customer_reviews.text: This was the most popular toy given to our 1.5yo in many months. Nothing's getting built, as yet, but he's very satisfied with the snapping together of stacks and with the destruction of vehicles which we've built.
customer_reviews.author: NoManhattanIsAnIsland

customer_reviews.title: Good for even younger kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these during a lightning deal due to all of the positive reviews. I thought my kids (2 years and 4 years) would be a little young to enjoy them but I was wrong. They love building with all types of blocks and these have been no exception. I think the magnets should be a little stronger and I'm glad I purchased an extra set as this one is on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Great building toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my 4-year-old to go along with the bucket of Magformers he already had. I read some reviews that felt this set was made more cheaply and didn't like it as much as other Magformers. I have to say that we have no complaints about this set and the wheels support way more weight/pieces than I thought they would. I love these toys; the possibilities for what my 4 & 7-year-olds build is endless.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Ideal for most ages
customer_reviews.text: This was my Christmas gift of choice for the children in my family this year. I purchased it for girls and boys ranging in age from 2 1/2 to 7 1/2. They all loved it and the idea of what you can build with it. The little ones were curious about the magnets and the others kids could not manipulate the shapes fast enough to make the desire structures. I would definitely recommend this toy. It is great to teach concepts about shapes, math, attention to detail and patience, etc.I love playing with it to.
customer_reviews.author: NewRoc Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good job.
customer_reviews.text: Every year I try to buy a new building type toy for my grandkids to have at my house, for when they come to visit. I was worried that it might have small parts that they younger children could put in their mouth. This was a lot bigger and nicer than I expected. Good job.
customer_reviews.author: CJ in LV

customer_reviews.title: Great invention. Not really a toy.
customer_reviews.text: Great for a child’s imagination. Extremely well made. I even liked playing with it. My great grandson wasn’t thrilled with the gift which surprised me since he loves to build with legos. He’s 7, so maybe when he’s older.
customer_reviews.author: butitsadryheat

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Toy!
customer_reviews.text: New favorite toy here. We got 2 sets of these for Christmas and my kids (9 & 11) love them. These will be great for teaching geometry as well. The basic set actually comes with a manual and directions for building tons of different geometric shapes, buildings, etc. This cruiser car set can combine with the basic set to make some really awesome vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: alpalb

customer_reviews.title: great for ages 4 and up
customer_reviews.text: this has been one of the BEST toys my son has received. He just turned 5 and can do all the sets by himself. We got this one and another pack and I have to say that the quality of the other set is better. Both are Magformers but these seem a little more flimsy and do fall apart more than the others. Overall it is a GREAT toy and I am glad we got both sets
customer_reviews.author: Myra Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Magformers
customer_reviews.text: It was gift to my grandson 4 year old birthday and it was a hit! He has enjoyed making and learning all the shapes and building pyramids and other "buildings" besides the "awesome" cars, he even took it to school for a "show and tell" describing triangles, squares etc His mother reports that he plays with it almost everyday. It is helping him with his fine motors, motor planning and creative thinking.
customer_reviews.author: Me and my dogs

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC
customer_reviews.text: This was a real hit for Christmas. Kiddo loves it. The construction is way better than the knock offs. I can see going bankrupt buying all the rest of them.
customer_reviews.author: joel

customer_reviews.title: I’m so happy I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: My kids have spent hours playing with these since Christmas. It was a toy I keep wanting to purchase, but always put back due to the cost. I’m so happy I made this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Magformer fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grandson LOVED this, as did his grandpa. Easy to play with and lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: MarianA

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!! This is a great set, so fun with the wheels. And they are so easy to build and put together, even my 3 year old can play with them himself. Perfect for any age. I purchased a basic kit to go along with this and it was the perfect combination. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Julia Barnes

customer_reviews.title: The product might be fine for a 3 yr old child
customer_reviews.text: This was not very challenging for a just-turned 5 yo boy--in fact, he does not play with it at all. The product might be fine for a 3 yr old child.
customer_reviews.author: T. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: These have super strong magnets so you can build all kinds of ...
customer_reviews.text: These have super strong magnets so you can build all kinds of things without the pieces coming apart from each other. Will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: TheJoge

customer_reviews.title: The magformers are nice with the option of wheels
customer_reviews.text: I could not decide between magformers and magna tiles. So I got both. The magformers are nice with the option of wheels. If you own both they don't work together. The price point is too high for what your getting. My son enjoyed the magna tiles more. We prefer the magna tiles because of the solid side. The magformers are open in the center.I expected the magformers to be bigger in size thickness, and width. My son played for hours with the magna tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Denny

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Works with magformers and makes neat cars , letting the imagination take over.
customer_reviews.author: Jaf

customer_reviews.title: Fun with magnets
customer_reviews.text: The grandchildren love to place withj these each time they come to visit.
customer_reviews.author: mapicsman

customer_reviews.title: This set is awesome. The hexagons are really fun
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. The hexagons are really fun. They are a little thinner and flatter than the regular Magformers, so they stick together a little better.
customer_reviews.author: Blank

customer_reviews.title: ... with other reviewers that these might not be as good as the regular magformers and do fall off sometimes ...
customer_reviews.text: I agree with other reviewers that these might not be as good as the regular magformers and do fall off sometimes if my son rolls the car too fast. But he really, really loves these. And I'm a fan of anything that encourages him to build. I think the regular ones are better for a wider variety of ages, where as you might need to be at least 4 or 5 to enjoy these more. We haven't had any problem with them breaking.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my 3-1/2 yr old and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my 3-1/2 yr old and I had to help him a bit to hold the wheels so he could make a car. I would not purchase this again. Difficult level for 3 yr old. Came as described in ad, so no complaints except for the wheels not staying still to make cars.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Great product I haven't met a kiddo that hasn't been obsessed with these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Denson

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift for 4 yr old grandsonl He loved them. Very sturdy quality
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for 4 yr old grandsonl He loved them. Very sturdy quality. Reasonably priced ob Prime Deals/Deal of the Day compared to big box stores. Actually the his Mother loved buidling them with him as well:)
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Love all the Magformers products
customer_reviews.text: Love all the Magformers products! Eat enough for my one year old to play with, yet not a cooking hazard. How awesome is that?! My five year old LOVES these pieces to make his old set"move". Wish they weren't so pricey, but with the play time we're getting, they pay for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these Magformer sets and they are *so* cool. They work really well and let you build fun structures. My 4-year old loves them and I bet that they'll still get use in a few years when she starts learning more geometry. Just wish they weren't so expensive. I want a set with pentagons, but will have to wait until Christmas to splurge...
customer_reviews.author: Oana

customer_reviews.title: Like this set
customer_reviews.text: Like this set. Size seems to be very slightly smaller than regular magformers. Still compatible, but bonds don't seem to be as strong.
customer_reviews.author: ycm

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of babyish. Wouldn’t recommend for 7 or older. Cool concept but you need like 100 Of them to make it worth while.
customer_reviews.author: TimelessInSeattle

customer_reviews.title: My boys love this. They play with it in different ways ...
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this. They play with it in different ways (as they're ages 6, 4, and 20mo), but they all 3 are able to enjoy playing with it. The fact that it comes with wheels has really kept my 6-yr-old especially engaged. High quality product, similar to other Magformers sets we've played with elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: They are ok...
customer_reviews.text: I had expected to have some genuine fun with these but the magnets do not offer enough resistance to make a lot of different things. They work really well, they are very strong magnets but it did not live up to my expectations of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Day

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love magformers and especially this set because it comes with wheels! Many more hours of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Angelgirl

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My boys LOVE these Magformers. I love that it encourages creativity! They are very durable - I have a teething 9 month old that chews on them and your can't even tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very fun for my 3.5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Very fun for my 3.5 year old. He loves it, and I really got into playing with it whenever he sets it down. Once I figured out ways to use the wheels (easy from the pictures), it's terrific. I've used other magnetic kits before but the wheels are a terrific addition.
customer_reviews.author: HN Fly

customer_reviews.title: No instruction booklet
customer_reviews.text: Great product, however no instructional book to show how to build the different vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Grandaughter Loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yo grandaughter is really into cars and loves Legos, so I thought this would be different. Guess it's more designed for a younger age, as she had constructed all the cars within about 15 minutes, and the pieces were a bit flimsy. She loved it, but I'm sure it won't hold up as long nor challenge her nearly as long as Legos. Four stars only because I thought it was overpriced for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old grandson LOVES this Magformers Cruiser Set ...
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson LOVES this Magformers Cruiser Set. He recently played with a set that my brother had bought for his grandchildren and could not put it down. So... this grandmother knew what to buy him for his birthday. His response when he opened his gift, "This is EXACTLY what I wanted."
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most favorite toy of all time!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are most definitely the most played with toy in the house!!! I have 2 boys that love anything with wheels and this allows them to use their imagation and make an endless number of cars (buggies, trucks, trailers etc)!!! - hours of fun! Will be buying more to add to our collection.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Magformers was imprinted on the wheels but not on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Magformers was imprinted on the wheels but not on the pieces. The pieces were not as thick and the magnet was not as strong as the ones that have magformers imprinted on the pieces. They still worked ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: These magnetic blocks are owned by another family member and they work great - so I figured I'd buy the car set ...
customer_reviews.text: Buying as a Christmas gift. These magnetic blocks are owned by another family member and they work great - so I figured I'd buy the car set version for my little cousin so he has his own set, too. Shipped incredibly fast as well, thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Y.

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our set
customer_reviews.text: Great set to add to our other Magformers. Wish it had more sets of wheels/axles. All 3 kids love the (ages 3,5&7)
customer_reviews.author: steven kolb

customer_reviews.title: kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but very creative learning set that kids love.
customer_reviews.author: S.A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Creative toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect toy for three years and up. All my kids have a great time with it. 13, 10, and 3 there are not many toys that all three can play with. Such a creative toy. So many possibilities.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: We saw our kids loved playing with something similar at daycare so we purchased these for xmas gifts and they love them. they like to try and make all different shapes and things. nothing negative to say!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought some of these for my grandson 2 years ago and now every grandchild has to have them. They are SO MUCH FUN. This is a toy that never gets shoved to the side. Hours of playing. Adults like it as well. I would recommend wheels because it makes them even more versitle. A must buy toy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good toy as it doesn't have lots of little parts to have to manipulate!
customer_reviews.author: C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My six year old grandson loves to build with magformers. This set offers several possibilities for different car designs. Vibrant colors and strong magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Magformers are amazing. My four and five year olds build and ...
customer_reviews.text: Magformers are amazing. My four and five year olds build and create with these cool magnetic shapes for long periods of times. I bought this set to add to their creations!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. you can do almost any type of build you want with these, you can even buy additional sets and combine them and build multiple sets at once. Only your childs imagination would limit them.. My 5 year old loves them. well done
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for my six year old grandson
customer_reviews.text: A great gift for my six year old grandson. We'd purchased the original set and he played with it quite a bit. For Christmas we added the set with wheels and that just added so many more options to what he could build. A great toy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Schlesser

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love these toys
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these toys. They are so expensive. But I would say they are a better investment in building a set of toys than even Legos. Fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Hair

customer_reviews.title: Magnets not as strong as other magformers
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the magnetic connection with these particular magformers. Magformers are usually pretty strong but these particular ones are weak and doesn't stay in car form for longer than a couple of seconds before it gives way.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this toy.
customer_reviews.text: I will buy more Magformers. My kids constantly play with them. I am also glad I spent the extra money to get a set with wheels. They are very durable and hold together well. They are also large enough to not be a danger for swallowing, like some other magnet toys.
customer_reviews.author: Flyfisher62

customer_reviews.title: Creative toy for all ages
customer_reviews.text: My 6.5 year old received these as an early Christmas present over the Thanksgiving holiday. He has other Magformers and also loves this set, especially the wheels. My 3 year old also likes to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these as well as the older kids, adults included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Legos have been too difficult for my grandson with small motor delay but Magformers are wonderful. They are easily manipulated and changeable to different functions or designs. Great imaginative play and creation. Only thing I would improve is 'how-to' guides with a little more detail on how to structure.
customer_reviews.author: Andie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Interesting concept.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice to have this toy set along with the bigger sets so my grandson can enjoy buildings a variety of things. This was purchased for a four year old- we are hoping as he grows he will find new and different ways to use the toy. Right now he prefers playing with it the original way!
customer_reviews.author: N. Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 5yo and 2yo LOVE THESE! We have added to the collection! We love playing with them too!
customer_reviews.author: davix

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy for all ages!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my four year old but the 5,7, 15 and 16 year old who we're visiting also liked it and wanted their own. They stay attached well, can make many different designs, and keeps me entertained as well. Great fun and educational!
customer_reviews.author: Wheaton il

customer_reviews.title: Cool concept.
customer_reviews.text: These are kind of hard to work with. They're fun, but to actually make a vehicle you need a couple of extra hands. OK if you can play with the child, but not something a 4 year old will do easily on their own.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Schnabel

customer_reviews.title: He especially enjoyed that he could make all kinds of cars using ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4-year-old. He absolutely loves it! He especially enjoyed that he could make all kinds of cars using the two wheel bases.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love these. I've actually had some fun using these also.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were a big hit with the kids and also with my husband who is an engineer. lol I think he had more fun with them than the kids did. You can make all sorts of things with ease. My grandson is only 2 years old and he was building cars and masks and all sorts of things. He had a ball with them. They're expensive--isn't everything . . .
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren loved them. Just wish they weren't so expensive so I could get another box. They don't come with enough pieces.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: A great gift to give
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my friend's 5 years old son for his birthday. He totally falls in love with it the minute he opens the box and couldn't take his hands off it. It is really good for kids creativity and help them to focus. So, as the gift giver, I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emmi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great, prompt service. Extremely happy. No problem ordering from you again. Doing a great job. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: bettie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, but the colors are a little drab. My grandkids love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have purchased these for my grand children and they love them.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these for my grand children and they love them.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Culp

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for kids who love to build and are interested in magnets
customer_reviews.text: I have always been nervous about my little ones playing with magnets but this set is completely safe, they are built into the pieces and are strong so the structures the kids build stay together. I have purchased 2 sets for birthday presents and their parents loved them as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Guthrie's

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these type of toys. 6, 3 and 1 years old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son and 6 year old daughter love these! They are easy enough for the 2 year old to play with but also complex enough that the 6 year old doesn't get bored. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: flyersbrb

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: magformers seem a bit high priced but are well worth it and so much better than an imitiation brand, VERY well made and sturdy and my grandsons have several sets and have so much fun building all sorts of things.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: A must buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the best toys on the planet! They are sturdy and very well built. My son's play with them for hours
customer_reviews.author: Jason L. Milner

customer_reviews.title: Big hit with mother and child
customer_reviews.text: Gift for grandchild who loved them as did the parent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for kids who already developed finger dexterity
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for kids who already developed finger dexterity. My girl is 2 and she can put the car together with my help of connecting them together.This toy can be used for many years.
customer_reviews.author: A.

customer_reviews.title: ... magformer sets for my grandsons last Christmas and they loved them. This year I bought them for my ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought magformer sets for my grandsons last Christmas and they loved them. This year I bought them for my great nephews and they and their grandfather really enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Miller

product_meta.title: Magformers XL Cruisers Set (32-pieces) Magnetic Building Blocks, Educational Magnetic Tiles Kit , Magnetic Construction STEM Toy Set includes wheels
product_meta.description:
Build your dream car with the XL Cruiser Car Set. Create zippy, colorful cars that are durable and fun to play with. Special silver bordered pieces enhance your designs and give all your models a super sleek look. Includes 16 squares, 12 triangles, 2 hexagons, and 2 wheel sets. This is a perfect starter car building set. Only the best materials are used, High Quality ABS Plastic and 1/3" rare-earth NEODYMIUM magnet on side of the shape.

 



Classic XL Cruisers Car


Imaginative Design made with XL Cruisers Car Set
Intelligent Magnetic Building For Brain Development 
MAGFORMERS are easy to use and never frustrating. The patented intelligently designed MAGFORMERS magnets are housed in colorful, high quality ABS plastic. They always attract and never repel, so the moment any two pieces touch they connect. High quality magnets that instantly connect are sure to spark curiosity and play time is creative, stimulating, and constructive. Building with MAGFORMERS engages mathematical and scientific thought, deductive reasoning, and requires use of spatial awareness. Manipulating the powerful, colorful MAGFORMERS magnets IS educational, but despite being an educational experience, play is magical and FUN!  

Your Imagination Drives This Engine. 
Classic Cars, Wacky Cars, Space Cars, Underwater Cars, Dragsters, Hot Rods, the building possibilities are endless...and they all have wheels! The XL Cruiser Car Set sparks imaginations of all ages leading to incredible designs that roll, zoom, and never break down. Use your dream car until you need the pieces for your next amazing automotive creation. This set doesn't just build, it moves! Take your MAGFORMERS XL Cruiser Cars on the road for hours of engaging play. 

 

You're In The Driver's Seat 
The XL Cruisers Car Set races on the scene for hour after hour of building fun. Custom design your own car for cruising on the weekend, or build the hot rod of your dreams. Durable and capable of withstanding the rigors of racing. Ladies and Gentlemen…Start Your Engines!

 What's In The Box? 
30 pieces: includes 16 squares, 12 triangles, 2 hexagons, and 2 wheel sets. 




XL Cruiser Car Dynamic "Dragster"
feature_bullets: ABS plastic magnets conform to CE, ASTM and EN71
You can make all different types of cars using the wheels and shapes with silver borders!
32 pieces: includes 16 squares, 12 triangles, 2 hexagons, and 2 wheel sets.
